text: August and Everything After is the debut studio album by the Counting Crows and released on 14 September, 1993 through Geffen Records. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 12 in Australia and New Zealand and number 16 in the United States. It went to receive two Grammy nominations in 1994. ==Track listing== ===Original release=== ===2007 deluxe edition bonus disc=== ==References== Category:1993 albums Category:Counting Crows
title: August and Everything After
